name: Elfwyrd in the Reach
description:
Please Download the Windows Build if you can, it looks and plays a lot better! Elfwyrd's dice control their fate - cast them forth and see where you land...

Introduction

With an endless array of randomised elements, and four worlds to discover, Elfwyrd in the Reach follows a timid adventurer set out to explore the far reaches of the world. Face off against foes and environmental hazards as you fight to stay alive in this arcade style platformer.

Controls

[R] or [R3] Reroll Character
[Space] or [X/A on controller] Jump
[WASD] or [Left Analog] Control Character

INCLUDES SUPPORT FOR AT LEAST TWO PLAYERS!!!
TRY TO GET TO THE HIGHEST ROUND YOU CAN!

CREDITS

Dead Bunny Studio are:

Level Design, Coding, Gameplay Design,  Interface: Zoey
2D Art, 3D Modelling, Animation, Coding Assistance: Luna
Music Composition & SFX: Annie

EVERYONE HELPED PLAN THE GAME.
